Here we use *tximport*, but eventually use *tximeta* to put
inferential replicates into a *SummarizedExperiment*.

```{r}
library(tximeta)
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(SummarizedExperiment))
dir <- "../../quants"
subdir <- rep(c("bias","unif"), each=12)
names <- rep(as.vector(t(outer(1:6,1:2,function(x,y) paste0(x,"_",y)))),2)
files <- file.path(dir, subdir, names, "quant.sf")
all(file.exists(files))
condition <- factor(sub(".*_(.)","\\1",names))
batch <- factor(rep(1:2,each=12))
coldata <- data.frame(files, names, condition, batch)
se <- tximeta(coldata)
```

```{r}
meanDepth <- exp(mean(log(colSums(assays(se)[["counts"]]))))
infReps <- assays(se)[grep("infRep",assayNames(se))]
infRepsAbund <- medianRatioScaledTPM(infReps, assays(se)[["length"]], meanDepth)
```

```{r}
y <- SummarizedExperiment(assays=infRepsAbund, colData=colData(se))
y <- preprocess(y)
y <- y[mcols(y)$keep,] # prefiltering
#save(y, file="y.rda") # 160 Mb
load("y.rda")
```

```{r}
y <- soggy(y, x="condition")
```

```{r}
y <- swamp(y, x="condition", cov="batch")
```
